sections.heading: 01|Financial institution - dealers in intangibles - insurance company definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 30, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 96 - 136th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections5725.01to5725.26of the Revised Code:(A) "Financial institution" means:(1) A national

sections.heading: section5725.25of the Revised Code do not apply to any other domestic insurance company that is not required by law, or by election made pursuant to law, to file annual reports with the superintendent nor to associations or corporations organized not for profit that admit to membership only employees
sections.text: section5725.25of the Revised Code do not apply to any other domestic insurance company that is not required by law, or by election made pursuant to law, to file annual reports with the superintendent nor to associations or corporations organized not for profit that admit to membership only employees of a person, firm, or corporation or employees of a group of employers engaged in the same or similar lines of business, who seek to provide indemnity among their members for loss from, or to provide a benefit in the event of, accident, sickness, or death of any of their number, whether by means of the exchange of private contracts between themselves or by the exchange of contracts between themselves and a corporation or association created for their protection and not for profit.
